entry.title: Building Octave-3.4 on Debian Sid
entry.content: I wanted to build the latest Octave (3.4) on my Debian Sid. Well, it wasn't as easy as before, since I upgrade it quite often. continue reading...

entry.title: Making Octave plot nicer
entry.content: Personally, I prefer Python over Octave/Matlab. But since I'm being forced to write Matlab code for one of my courses, I started playing around with Octave. continue reading...
